Name: 祖玛少女/Zuma Girls
About the game: Zuma Girls is an RPG-based zuma game. The game features tactical abilities apart from the original zuma game itself. You will meet a few pretty girls in various battles, and your goal is to beat them up! ◆Fun gameplay, a zuma game with RPG modules ◆NTR is included in DLC, not recommended if you mind ◆Rich content, 9 stages, every stage are unique ◆Original good music, at least 10 tracks ◆Good art and character designs
